sentences.en: “A career is born in public-talent in privacy”(&b{Marilyn Monroe})
sentences.cn: “事业是基于在私下公开的才智而形成的”(&b{玛丽琳·门罗})

sentences.en: a public telephone
sentences.cn: 公用电话

sentences.en: Both his grandfathers were fired with an enthusiasm for public speaking.
sentences.cn: 他的祖父和外公都热衷于演说。

sentences.en: By-laws are to make it illegal to smoke in public.
sentences.cn: 地方法规将规定在公共场合抽烟为非法。

sentences.en: full public access to information
sentences.cn: 公众对信息的充分知情权

sentences.en: He balanced his budgets by rigid control over public expenditure.
sentences.cn: 他通过严格控制公共开支保持预算平衡。

sentences.en: He is adored by his public.
sentences.cn: 他深受支持者喜爱。

sentences.en: He was headmaster of a public school in the West of England.
sentences.cn: 他是英格兰西部一所公学的校长。

sentences.en: I avoid working in places which are too public.
sentences.cn: 我避免在过于抛头露面的地方工作。

sentences.en: Its beautiful gardens and parkland are also open to the public.
sentences.cn: 它漂亮的花园和绿地也向公众开放。

sentences.en: Marilyn made her last public appearance at Madison Square Garden.
sentences.cn: 玛丽莲最后一次公开亮相是在麦迪逊广场花园。

sentences.en: New Year's Day is a public holiday throughout Britain.
sentences.cn: 元旦是全英国的公众假日。

sentences.en: Public opinion is gradually shifting in favor of the imprisoned men.
sentences.cn: 舆论渐渐倾向于同情入狱的男子。

sentences.en: Someone cranked up the volume of the public address system.
sentences.cn: 有人调大了公共广播系统的音量。

sentences.en: The company went public after having been closely held for 12 years.
sentences.cn: 这个公司在被紧密地控制了十二年之后，终于公开召股了

sentences.en: The extra money could be spent on improving public transport.
sentences.cn: 多余的资金可以用于改善公共交通系统。

sentences.en: The facts could cause embarrassment if they ever became public.
sentences.cn: 一旦披露出去，真相会让人非常尴尬。

sentences.en: The meeting will be open to the general public .
sentences.cn: 会议将向公众开放。

sentences.en: The move follows growing public concern over the spread of the disease.
sentences.cn: 针对公众对该疾病的不断蔓延日益担忧，从而出台了这一举措。

sentences.en: The president finally had to go public with the scandal.
sentences.cn: 总统最后只有把这桩丑闻公之于众

sentences.en: the pressures of being constantly &B{in the public eye}.
sentences.cn: 总在公众眼皮子底下的压力。

sentences.en: The public never had faith in his ability to handle the job.
sentences.cn: 公众从来不相信他有能力胜任这一职位。

sentences.en: The two officers were being investigated by the director of public prosecutions.
sentences.cn: 两名警官正在接受检察官的审查。

sentences.en: Their activities have been hidden from the public gaze (= people’s eyes or attention ) .
sentences.cn: 他们的活动一直在避开公众的视线。

sentences.en: There needs to be a properly informed public debate.
sentences.cn: 有必要让公众在充分知情的状况下展开辩论。

sentences.en: There was a public outcry (= expression of anger by a lot of people ) about the shooting.
sentences.cn: 公众就枪击事件发出了强烈抗议。

sentences.en: We have to show that publishing this story is in the public interest (= helpful or useful to ordinary people ) .
sentences.cn: 我们必须证明刊登这篇报道有利于公众。
